<a name="Chain"></a>
## type [Chain](<https://github.com/0chain/gosdk/blob/doc/initial/zmagmacore/chain/entity.go#L8-L14>)

Chain represents data structure that holds the chain data.

```go
type Chain struct {
    ID           string
    Version      string
    CreationDate time.Timestamp
    OwnerID      string
    BlockWorker  string
}
```
